property.name: solr_port
property.description: Solr port

property.name: solr_jmx_port
property.description: Solr JMX port

property.name: solr_pid_dir
property.description: Solr Process ID Directory

property.name: solr_log_dir
property.description: Directory for Solr logs

property.name: solr_user
property.description: Solr user

property.name: solr_datadir
property.description: Directory for storting Solr index. Make sure you have enough disk space

property.name: solr_ssl_enabled
property.description: Enable ssl to Solr

property.name: solr_truststore_location
property.description: Location of the trust store file. (default value is not generated)

property.name: solr_truststore_type
property.description: Type of the trust store file.

property.name: solr_truststore_password
property.description: Password to open the trust store file.

property.name: solr_keystore_password
property.description: Password to open the key store file.

property.name: solr_znode
property.description: Zookeeper znode, e.g: /solr

property.name: solr_minmem
property.description: Solr minimum heap size e.g. 512m

property.name: solr_maxmem
property.description: Solr maximum heap size e.g. 512m

property.name: solr_java_stack_size
property.description: Java Stack Size of Solr (-Xss) in MB.

property.name: solr_jmx_enabled
property.description: Set to true to activate the JMX RMI connector to allow remote JMX client applications to monitor the JVM hosting Solr

property.name: solr_kerberos_keytab
property.description: The path to the Kerberos Keytab file containing service principal of the Solr.

property.name: solr_kerberos_principal
property.description: The service principal for Solr.

property.name: solr_web_kerberos_keytab
property.description: The path to the Kerberos Keytab file containing service principal of the Solr.

property.name: solr_web_kerberos_principal
property.description: The service principal for the Solr.

property.name: solr_zookeeper_quorum
property.description: Placeholder for Solr Zookeeper connection string. (Use the cluster one by default, you can override this with a custom one if ZK needs to be external)

property.name: solr_host
property.description: Placeholder for Solr Zookeeper connection string. (Use the cluster one by default, you can override this with a custom one if ZK needs to be external)

property.name: solr_zookeeper_external_principal
property.description: The kerberos service principal name for external ZooKeeper.

property.name: solr_zookeeper_external_enabled
property.description: Enable external ZooKeeper. If the Solr is secure, the external ZK should be secure as well.

property.name: solr_kerberos_name_rules
property.description: Kerberos name rules for Spnego

property.name: solr_user_nofile_limit
property.description: Max open files limit setting for solr user.

property.name: solr_user_nproc_limit
property.description: Max number of processes limit setting for solr user.

property.name: solr_extra_java_opts
property.description: Extra Solr java options (e.g.: -Dproperty=value), that will be added to SOLR_OPTS environment variable

property.name: content
property.description: This is the freemarker template for solr-env.sh file
